Name: Average time from 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time between 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Average resolution time for 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER and the end of the case

Name: Total time from 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Average time it takes 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' after 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Total resolution time of cases involving 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' before 'Request Payment'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Minimum time it takes the 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' to be done after 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Average waiting time to the 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Total time for 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' in cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER occurs

Name: Average time for 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' in successful cases without 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER does not occur

Name: Time until 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' from the start of the process
Metric: The sum of the duration between the start of the case and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Time from 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' to the next activity in the most frequent variant
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER and the end of the case

Name: 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' Cycle Time in comparison to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' Cycle Time
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Elapsed time between 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' in cases exceeding average processing time
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
